passage_text: 6. Green Bananas: Since banana is rich in nutrients, eating banana during pregnancy is a boon. 1  If you want to gorge on something low in calorie and with absolutely no fat, green bananas can be a good inclusion in your diet. 2  You can have them boiled as well.

1 Bananas are a good source of Vitamin C, which acts as an antioxidant in the body. 2  Antioxidants fight against damage caused by free radicals that can lead to some types of cancer, as well as heart disease and premature ageing. 3  Vitamin C is very important during your pregnancy as it helps to boost your immune system.

Bananas are safe during pregnancy. In fact, they are a very wholesome and nutritious choice, and you can have 1 to 2 big bananas every day. Bananas have great nutritional value. Bananas are packed with energy value, good quality protein, vitamins and minerals.

Myth! In fact it's advised fir pregnant women to eat bananas during pregnancy since they promote good colon health, prevents anemia, leg cramps & helps reduce swelling, etc. at least a banana a day will keep the doctor away! :). posted 08/09/2013 by DLBarbee. Report answer.

1 Bananas are an excellent source of potassium, which helps to keep blood pressure at a normal level, which is important during pregnancy. 2  It is also important for a healthy nervous system and kidneys. 3  One medium banana contains 350mg potassium, which is around 12% of the recommended daily intake (RDI).
